contents.contents: Walk down the rue Saint Jean. At the end of it, on your left, you will find the Tithe Barn.
Look at the stones on the wall. They are called “crows”.

question.contents: What were the crows used for?
choices: To serve as perches for birds
To protect the people in the market place

explanations.contents: Formerly, there were so many stalls along the street  that it was impossible to see the sky because of their awnings.
